data.description: Learn how to mount a theatrical production. Through scenery, costumes, lighting, sound, and stage management explore the relationship between the technical components of the production process. Includes lectures as well as practical experience in University Theatre productions.
data.title: TECHNICAL THEATRE FUNDAMENTALS

data.description: Advanced study of organizational behaviors, theatre infrastructures, styles  communication techniques in relation to Stage Management.
data.title: ADVANCED CONCEPTS IN STAGE MANAGEMENT

data.description: Principles of stage management from auditions through closing night. Class work and supplementary production experience.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO STAGE MANAGEMENT
